THE OHIO STATE UNIVERSITY
TELECOMMUNICATIONS CENTER
2470 NORTH STAR ROAD
COLUMBUS 21, OHIO
Richard B. Hull, Executive Director
March 23, 1961
Wi11iam G. Harley
1346 Connecticut Ave., N.W.
Washington, D. C.
Dear Bill:
Can you shed any light on the attached letter from
Adrio Casati of Milan, Italy? Is this another
development we may attribute to Lennie Marks or
does this relate to the RCA-financed venture about
which you spoke?
Best wishes.
Sincerely
Richard B. Hull
Execu tive Direc to r
